doc:
Guy Raymond https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guy_Raymond 0 Guy Raymond (July 1, 1911 – January 26, 1997) was an American actor. He appeared in the films 4D Man, Sail a Crooked Ship, Gypsy, It Happened at the World's Fair, The Russians Are Coming, the Russians Are Coming, The Reluctant Astronaut, The Ballad of Josie, Wild in the Streets, Bandolero! and The Undefeated, among others. He died on January 26, 1997, in Santa Monica, California at age 85. Guy_Raymond ( July_1_,_1911 – January_26_,_1997 ) was an_American_actor . He appeared in the_films_4D_Man , Sail a_Crooked_Ship , Gypsy , It Happened at the_World 's_Fair , The_Russians Are_Coming , the_Russians Are_Coming , The_Reluctant_Astronaut , The_Ballad of Josie , Wild in the_Streets , Bandolero ! and The_Undefeated_, among others . He died on January_26_,_1997 , in Santa_Monica , California at age_85 .
